name: Lochinvar
description:
Whilst investigating the death of a local family, you uncover a legend about a cursed manor. Now you need to find 5 pieces of evidence about the missing family and get out.

Use WASD to move

Mouse to look around

and "E" to interact.

Known bugs:

-Doors won't open or budge

How to finish:

-You need to hear the sounds of key items and grab them with "E".

-If you're stuck go to the end of this page

-There is one in the bathroom, in the living room(place with one tv and a couch in front of it), in the room with 4 TVs, in the room with one tv and two couches beside it and the last one in the kitchen after the mini maze. Once you grab all key items go through the giant door northeast and walk north until the end of the room to finish the game
